text: Kampung Jelutong is a small village located about 12 km south of Kangar, Perlis, Malaysia. ==Amenities== ===Schools=== *Sekolah Kebangsaan Jelutong *Sekolah Ugama Jelutong ===Shops & Services=== *Caltex petrol kiosk *Barber shop *Coffee shops *Motorcycle repair shop *Sundry shops *Telecom sub-station ===Communities=== *Jelutong Mosque *Local people's hall *Camping ground Category:Villages in Perak
title: Kampung Jelutong
